meanings.sent1: The cake was nummier than the cookies.
meanings.sent2: The ice cream was nummier than the frozen yogurt.
meanings.sent3: The chocolate was so nummier that it disappeared in seconds.
meanings.sent4: Her cooking skills were a nummier version of magic.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the freshly baked bread was nummier than anything I had ever smelled.

meanings.definition: in a more nummy or delicious manner
meanings.sent1: She ate the cake nummier than anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The chef cooked nummier than before.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream melted nummier than expected.
meanings.sent4: The flavors blended together nummier than a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The dessert was nummier when served warm.

meanings.definition: a person or thing that is more nummy or delicious
meanings.sent1: She was known as the nummier in the family for her baking.
meanings.sent2: The bakery's specialty was the nummier on the menu.
meanings.sent3: The nummier of the party was the chocolate fountain.
meanings.sent4: He was the nummier in the group when it came to choosing restaurants.
meanings.sent5: The nummier at the potluck was the homemade pie.
